meta.title_zh: 請推薦：招牌菜與口味偏好

dialogue.text: Welcome! Is this your first time here?
dialogue.zh:
Welcome! 是 this your first time here?
Welcome! 私 this your first time here?

是的, it 是.
はい, it 私.

dialogue.text: Great. Would you like any recommendations?
dialogue.zh:
太好了. Would 你 like 任何 recommendations?
いいですね. Would あなた like any recommendations?

是的, what’s your signature dish?
はい, what’s your signature dish?

dialogue.text: Our beef stew is very popular.
dialogue.zh:
Our beef stew 是 very popular.
Our beef stew 私 very popular.

是 it spicy?
私 it spicy?

dialogue.text: It’s mildly spicy. We can make it less spicy.
dialogue.zh:
It’s mildly spicy. We 可以 make it less spicy.
It’s mildly spicy. We できます make it less spicy.

Less spicy would be better.
Less spicy would be better.

dialogue.text: No problem. Do you prefer rice or pasta?
dialogue.zh:
不 problem. 你 prefer rice or pasta?
いいえ problem. Do あなた prefer rice or pasta?

Rice, 請.
Rice, お願いします.

dialogue.text: The beef stew comes with rice.
dialogue.zh:
The beef stew comes with rice.
The beef stew comes with rice.

Perfect.
Perfect.

Would 你 like an appetizer?
Would あなた like an appetizer?

Maybe. What’s 東西 light?
Maybe. What’s something light?

Our Caesar salad 是 light.
Our Caesar salad 私 light.

好的, 我’ll take that.
わかりました, 私’ll take that.

任何 drink 你?
Any drink for あなた?

我’ll 有 冰的 茶.
私’ll have アイス お茶.

Sweetened or unsweetened?
Sweetened or unsweetened?

Unsweetened, 請.
Unsweetened, お願いします.

Would 你 like lemon?
Would あなた like lemon?

是的, 請.
はい, お願いします.

dialogue.text: Alright: Caesar salad, beef stew (less spicy), and iced tea.
dialogue.zh:
Alright: Caesar salad, beef stew (less spicy), and 冰的 茶.
Alright: Caesar salad, beef stew (less spicy), and アイス お茶.

That’s correct.
That’s correct.

Anything else?
Anything else?

That’s all.
That’s all.

太好了. It’ll be 缺 soon.
いいですね. It’ll be out soon.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

Enjoy your meal!
Enjoy your meal!

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.
